TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract AutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class AutomationPeer Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供將元素公開至使用者介面自動化的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class that exposes an element to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]查詢的根[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目的相關的應用程式，會傳回根[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等項目。When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element. 對等電腦也會回應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]其對應的項目相關的查詢。The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 當衍生類別的建構函式呼叫基本類別值時，提供基本類別值的初始設定。

span.span: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Automation::Peers::AutomationPeer ^ EventsSource { System::Windows::Automation::Peers::AutomationPeer ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Automation::Peers::AutomationPeer ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，其報告至自動化用戶端，作為所有來自此 的事件來源。

span.span: Gets or sets an that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this .
The that is the source of events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetAcceleratorKey() cil managed

summary.span: 取得與 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 對等相關聯之元素的快速鍵組合。

span.span: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
The accelerator key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAcceleratorKeyCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetAcceleratorKeyCore () As String

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 呼叫。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .
The accelerator key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式回應鍵盤事件來提供快速鍵行為，則應該傳回字串，包含鍵盤快速鍵組合。If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination. 例如，可以將文字複製到剪貼簿的項目，此附加的屬性可能會設定為"CTRL + C"的值。For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetAccessKey() cil managed

summary.span: 取得與自動化對等相關聯之項目的存取金鑰。

span.span: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
The string that contains the access key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAccessKeyCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetAccessKeyCore () As String

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 呼叫。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .
The string that contains the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的功能表、 功能表項目或例如叫用相關的功能表函式的按鈕控制項的標籤文字的字元 （有時稱為鍵盤快速鍵或助憶鍵） 的存取金鑰。An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function. 例如，若要提供快顯的方式來開啟`File`功能表 （適用於存取金鑰通常是 F），項目可能會有這個附加的屬性設定為"ALT + F"。For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".

summary.span: 告知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 樹狀結構中的何處放置 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目所主控的 。

span.span: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

returns.span: 這個方法會針對主控 物件的控制項，將主控 傳回給 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

span.span: This method returns the hosted to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會針對主控 `hwnd` 物件的控制項，將主控 `hwnd` 傳回給 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects. 立即裝載的項目與相關聯`hwnd`必須覆寫這個方法。The that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method. 如果這個方法不會覆寫，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]放置`hwnd`為的子元素裝載整個應用程式。If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the that hosts the whole application. 一般而言，您要覆寫此預設行為，並設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]定位託管`hwnd`平行它所在的位置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]邏輯樹狀結構。Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] logical tree. 除非在裝載案例中，不允許覆寫這個方法的型別。Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow types to override this method. 覆寫這個方法，除了立即裝載的項目相關聯的型別`hwnd`必須傳回轉型成回應傳給裝載WM_GETOBJECT`hwnd`.In addition to overriding this method, the types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the that is cast to in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`. 若要取得的指標，呼叫。To get a pointer to , call .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果項目，則控制項，方法取得如相關聯。For example, if the element is a control, the method gets the for the that is associated with the . 在下圖「 主題 」 的目標為; 因此如也為目標。In the following image, the "Themes" is targeted to the ; therefore the for the also targets the . 當使用者按**ALT**+**T**、取得焦點，而不是。When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the gets focus instead of the . ![顯示屬性顯示用法所標記的](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "顯示用法所標記的顯示屬性")![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") 方法傳回對應。The method for returns the for the corresponding . 這可讓 automation 用戶端取得文字字串描述。This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetNameCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetNameCore () As String

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 呼叫。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .
The string that contains the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此值視為使用者用來說明他們要參考控制項的字串。You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to. 這個屬性可由工具，例如 [朗讀程式] 來告訴使用者控制項是什麼。This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is. 例如，使用字串 [確定] 按鈕應該會傳回 [確定]。For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK". A控制項，讓使用者選取一個色彩可能會傳回"Colors"。A control that lets users select a color might return "Colors". 請確定您已在所有的控制項指派名稱[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，讓協助工具，例如螢幕助讀程式可以參考到每個控制項，以當地語系化的方式。Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidatePeer() cil managed

summary.span: 觸發重新計算 的主要屬性，並在屬性變更時引發對自動化用戶端的 通知。

span.span: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the and raises the notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要屬性的範例包括但不限於，和。Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, and . 一般而言，更新和通知，會自動在版面配置更新之後[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]. (為了回應進行更新事件。)有時候，不過，屬性變更而不會引發事件。(The update occurs in response to the event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the event. 例如，當整個移動，不會引發事件。For example, when the whole moves, the event is not raised. 在此範例中，一組物件變更，因為這些物件會以螢幕座標表示。In this example, the set of objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates. 因此，必須呼叫其對等端上。Therefore, the must call on its peer on .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsContentElement() cil managed

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示與此 Automation Peer 相關聯的項目是否包含呈現給使用者的資料。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.

returns.span: 如果項目是內容項目則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is a content element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容項目包含呈現給使用者的資料。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 舉例來說，內容項目是清單方塊中的項目或在對話方塊中的按鈕。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box. 您通常會使用非內容項目 （也稱為周邊項目） 搭配複合控制項中的內容。You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control. 非內容元素的範例是在下拉式清單控制項。An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.

returns.span: 如果項目不在螢幕上則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 比方說，如果項目但遮蔽其他項目在螢幕上時，它可能無法顯示。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在此情況下，方法會傳回`false`。In this case, the method returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool ListenerExists(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationEvents eventId) cil managed
Public Shared Function ListenerExists (eventId As AutomationEvents) As Boolean

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在接聽指定的事件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
A that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您呼叫這個方法建立之前會引發此事件。Typically, you call this method before creating the that raises the event. 此方法是效能量值，因為如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不會接聽事件，並不合理來建立來引發一個對等。This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法是靜態的只有答案委派中指定的事件接聽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，不適用於特定的項目上的事件。This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 可以建立廣播接聽程式。因此每個項目資訊無關。 can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
